title.rendered: Tastebudz Back To The Future Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
🚀 Back to the Future Auto – Autoflowering Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Powerful Back to the Future Auto Seeds | 27% THC Autoflower

Experience a next-level seed collection with Back to the Future Auto, the autoflowering version of Tastebudz Syndicate’ futuristic favourite. Created by crossing Gorilla Glue #4 (Original Glue) with Alien Tahoe OG, this mostly Indica hybrid is known for its fast life cycle, rich flavour profile, and stunning resin production.

With 27% THC, this strain offers deep physical relaxation paired with uplifting euphoria — all wrapped up in a short 8–10 week cycle. Whether you’re building your seed vault or simply exploring premium autoflowering genetics, Back to the Future Auto is a must-have.

👉 Prefer photoperiod genetics? Click here for the Back to the Future feminized seeds →

📊 Back to the Future Auto Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Gorilla Glue #4 x Alien Tahoe OG
Strain Type 80% Indica / 20% Sativa (Autoflowering)
THC Content Up to 27%
Seed to Harvest 8–10 Weeks (Autoflowering)
Indoor Yield Up to 650g/m²
Outdoor Yield Up to 1500g/plant
Flavours Earthy pine, sour lemon, kush
Aromas Pungent citrus, herbal pine, diesel
Effects Euphoric, calm, deeply relaxing

🌿 Why Back to the Future Auto Is a Must-Have Strain

Built for performance and ease, Back to the Future is one of the most versatile options in the Tastebudz lineup. Its autoflowering genetics make it an excellent choice for seed collectors who value a fast-finishing indica-dominant hybrid with heavyweight THC levels and rich terpene depth.

Perfect for compact setups, stealth seed collections, or seasonal rotations, this strain delivers power without the wait.

🌈Flavour & Aroma Profile

Back to the Future  offers an earthy pine inhale balanced with zesty lemon and a kushy exhale. Thanks to its terpene profile — which includes Alpha-Pinene, Limonene, and Linalool — the aroma is bold, fresh, and instantly recognisable. The flavour alone makes it a standout for autoflower seed collectors seeking something special in their rotation.

💥 Effects & THC Potency

With 27% THC, Back to the Future Auto delivers a powerful indica-led experience. Expect fast onset euphoria, followed by full-body calm that’s perfect for stress relief, winding down, or enjoying a peaceful evening.

The effects strike a balance between mental clarity and deep physical relaxation, making it ideal for collectors who appreciate potent, feel-good strains.

🌱 Seed Collection & Indoor/Outdoor Appeal

Collectors appreciate Back to the Future Auto for its consistent returns and fast turnaround. With yields up to 650g/m² indoors and up to 1500g/plant outdoors, it’s an excellent performer across different environments.

No light cycle manipulation is needed. Just place it in your collection and let it do its thing — compact, efficient, and rewarding.

💡 Want more autoflower options? Browse our full Autoflowering Feminized Seeds range.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About Back to the Future Auto

1. What is Back to the Future Auto?

Back to the Future Auto is a fast-finishing, high-THC strain from Tastebudz Syndicate — a cross of Gorilla Glue #4 and Alien Tahoe OG.

2. Is Back to the Future Auto easy to grow?

Yes! It’s ideal for collectors of all levels thanks to its autoflowering structure and dependable results.

3. What does Back to the Future taste like?

Expect earthy pine, sour lemon, and deep kush notes — a terpene-rich profile with citrus and fuel edges.

4. How long does Back to the Future Auto take?

Back to the Future Auto completes its cycle in 8–10 weeks, making it one of the fastest options in the Tastebudz collection.

5. Is there a photoperiod version available?

Yes! Click here to view the Back to the Future feminized seeds →

🧬 Why Choose Back to the Future Auto?

  • 🔥 27% THC for heavy-hitting, long-lasting effects
  • 🕒 8–10 week seed-to-finish autoflower timeline
  • 🌲 Kush, pine, lemon terpene richness
  • 💪 Excellent indoor and outdoor performance
  • ✅ Collector-friendly with consistent results

📝 Featured in Our 2024 Yield Champions Blog
Looking for even more reasons to collect Back to the Future Auto? This powerhouse strain was recently highlighted in our Best Yielding Cannabis Strains of 2024 blog for its exceptional performance and resin production. If you’re seeking high yields, short cycles, and serious THC content, Back to the Future Auto should be at the top of your collection list.

⚠️ Legal Disclaimer (UK)

Back to the Future Auto cannabis seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs in accordance with UK law. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued licence. Please research and comply with local laws before purchasing.
